Summary: clear, transparent orb with starlike object in cen
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fairburn
There were no other sightings in Fairburn on or around January 25th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness #1 was walking her dog in the backyard of her house. Witness #1 saysthat the clear, transparency and the light made her notice the object. Atfirst, the Witness stated that she thought it was a remotely piloted object, butit made no sound. The witnesses actions were first that of being scared andmade her backtrack. After the sighting, she had a feeling of elation. Theobject was a clear, transparent orb with a starlike object in the center (like aChristmas Tree ornament) which sort of wobbled and hovered before taking off ata high rate of speed over the rooftop of the witness house (easterlydirection).
